entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
